sentences.en: a small school with just three teachers and the principal
sentences.cn: 只有三位老师和一位校长的小型学校

sentences.en: Applications with a full curriculum vitae and two references should reach the Principal by June 12th.
sentences.cn: 申请书连同完整个人简历和两份推荐信必须在6月12日以前送达校长处。

sentences.en: City's principal marksman was Joe Harvey who scored seventeen goals.
sentences.cn: 市队的头号射手是打进17粒进球的乔·哈维。

sentences.en: Donald King is the principal of Dartmouth High School.
sentences.cn: 唐纳德·金是达特茅斯中学的校长。

sentences.en: His principal reason for making the journey was to visit his family.
sentences.cn: 他那次旅程的首要目的是探访家人。

sentences.en: His teacher sent him off to the principal's office.
sentences.cn: 他的老师派他到校长室去.

sentences.en: Manchester College elected him Principal in 1956.
sentences.cn: 曼彻斯特学院于1956年推选他做院长。

sentences.en: She's been downgraded from principal to vice-principal.
sentences.cn: 她已从校长降职为副校长。

sentences.en: Stoppard had to recast four of the principal roles.
sentences.cn: 斯托帕德只好更换4个主要角色的人选。

sentences.en: Teaching is her principal source of income.
sentences.cn: 教书是她主要的收入来源。

sentences.en: The boys like the principal because he always plays fair.
sentences.cn: 这些男孩们喜欢这位校长,因为他待人公平.

sentences.en: The college principal promised to look into the matter.
sentences.cn: 学院院长答应研究这个问题。

sentences.en: the principal character in the book
sentences.cn: 书里的主人公

sentences.en: The principal issues in dispute concern the duration of the future treaty.
sentences.cn: 有争议的主要问题牵涉到将来条约的期限.

sentences.en: The principal led off by welcoming all the new students.
sentences.cn: 校长以欢迎全体新同学作为开场.

sentences.en: The principal of the business has an office in New York.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的负责人在纽约有一处办公室。

sentences.en: The teacher conferred with the principal about Dick's promotion.
sentences.cn: 教师与校长商谈了迪克的升级问题.

sentences.en: The two principal combustion products are water vapor and carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: 两种主要的燃烧产物是水蒸气和二氧化碳。

sentences.en: They will continue Mr. Kabe as acting principal of the school.
sentences.cn: 他们将继续让凯布先生做该校代理校长.

sentences.en: When he saw the principal, he raised his hand in salutation.
sentences.cn: 他看到校长时举手敬礼.

words.tran_cn: 校长；委托人，当事人；资本；主犯

phrases.tran_cn: 最大主应力，第一主应力
总部，总社；总办事处；校长室

trans.tran_cn: 最重要的，主要的，资本的，本金的
校长，主要演员，主角，[法]委托人，当事人，本金
trans.tran_en: someone who is in charge of a school
